sentences.english: Each fall, there is always a slack space, which is kind of a time when broad bean.
sentences.chinese: 每年秋季，總會有一段農閒間隙，這是種蠶豆的時候。

sentences.english: Micronucleus test of Vicia faba root tips cell is used to research the genotoxicity of Trichloroethylene (TCE).
sentences.chinese: 應用蠶豆根尖微核試驗研究了三氯乙烯的遺傳毒性。

sentences.english: The insect origin on the susceptive vegetables in spring and tobacco seedlings came from the broad bean fields.
sentences.chinese: 春季蔬菜及烤煙苗上南美斑潛蠅蟲源主要來自蠶豆田。

sentences.english: Sometimes I take 'em off with a bean.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我就拿蠶豆來治它們。

sentences.english: It may tender the meat in canned ham and soften the skin of horse bean in canned horse bean.
sentences.chinese: 它可以在招標罐頭火腿肉罐頭和軟化的蠶豆蠶豆皮膚。

sentences.english: It may tender the meat in canned ham and soften the skin of horse bean in canned horse bean.
sentences.chinese: 它可以在招標罐頭火腿肉罐頭和軟化的蠶豆蠶豆皮膚。

sentences.english: Li planted two mu of broad beans last  autumn, but he has seen no  yield because of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 去年秋天李彥博種了兩畝蠶豆，但由於乾旱顆粒無收。

sentences.english: Third in importance is the broad, or fava, bean, the principal bean of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 蠶豆的重要性佔第三位，是歐洲的主要豆種。

sentences.english: They picked some favas to stay their hunger.
sentences.chinese: 他們摘了一些蠶豆充飢。

sentences.english: Faba bean had strong ability of rhizosphere acidification.
sentences.chinese: 蠶豆有很強的根際酸化能力。

sentences.english: Add beans and cook until just heated through, then season with sea salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 加入蠶豆一起煸炒到熟透，用鹽和胡椒調味。

sentences.english: Buckets are heavily loaded with favas.
I ate his liver with some fava beans and anice Chianti.
sentences.chinese: 我就着蠶豆和酒，把他的肝臟喫掉了。

sentences.english: Li planted two mu of broad beans last autumn, but he has seen no yield because of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 去年秋天李彥博種了兩畝蠶豆，但由於乾旱顆粒無收。

sentences.english: I also see some information on the faba bean flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我又查看了一些有關蠶豆花的資料。

definition: Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
